abstract: Three profitable Chinese companies are expected to have powerful market debuts this week, as they impress investors with balance sheets and earnings that are stronger than many debt-heavy U.S. companies.
snippet: Three profitable Chinese companies are expected to have powerful market debuts this week, as they impress investors with balance sheets and earnings that are stronger than many debt-heavy U.S. companies.
lead_paragraph: Three profitable Chinese companies are expected to have powerful market debuts this week, as they impress investors with balance sheets and earnings that are stronger than many debt-heavy American companies, The Associated Press said.

headline.main: Strong Debuts Expected for China I.P.O.’s
